message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $180 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend. Would you be willing to come down to $150?
Hi Bob, I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $150. How about we meet in the middle at $165? I'm willing to compromise and give you a great deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $165 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go higher than $155. If you're willing to meet me there, I'll take it.

Hi Bob, I understand that $155 is your limit, but I'm still not willing to sell it to you for that price. I'm willing to make one more offer. How about we meet at $160? It's a fair price considering the value of the product, and I think you'll really enjoy it.
